# Basic usage

Make a figure:

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Width, fill=Species)) +
   geom_density(alpha = 0.7)

p
```

Convert to simulated color-blind version:
```{r message=FALSE}
library(colorblindr)
p2 <- edit_colors(p, deutan)
cowplot::ggdraw(p2)
```

Or make a desaturated version:
```{r message=FALSE}
library(colorspace) # for desaturate function
p2 <- edit_colors(p, desaturate)
cowplot::ggdraw(p2)
```
